name: Tainted Treasure
description:
Reach the bottom of the tainted cave in this reaction-battle roguelike!

In order to uncover the mystery of the secret treasure, you have to reach the lowest level of the tainted cave.

But this will be no easy feat as there are countless corrupted enemies standing in your way.

Features

  • 12 Unique Enemy Types
  • 6 Player Attacks
  • 14 Items
  • 3 Areas
  • 5 Special Room Types
  • 2v2 Battle Action
  • Unlockable Color Palettes
  • 1-Bit Pixel Art Style
  • Adaptive Music to chill/dance to
  • Optional Hard Mode

Battle through Enemy Duos, buy Items and improve your loadout as you venture deeper into the cave.

Your reactions are vital in this dungeon-crawler because you deal more damage when you time your attacks right.

Your enemies always have a tell. Once you figure it out, you can even dodge their attacks!

I am Wardius, a solo game developer and made this game in about six months. I was really inspired by the game "Gun Rounds" by blabberf.
